segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a two-day trip around the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please have a look at the table ? I think this one fits you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's interesting . I think I will take the bus tour . By the way , what about the lodging ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will lodge at the indigenes ' houses . It's interesting .
segments.speaker: S1
